info.title: ScriptTag
info.description:
The ScriptTag resource represents remote JavaScript code that is loaded into the pages of a shop's storefront or the order status page of checkout. This lets you add functionality to those pages without using theme templates.

Script tags are scoped to the app that created them. When an app is uninstalled from a shop, all of the script tags that it created are automatically removed along with it.

paths.description: Retrieves a list of all script tags. Note: As of version 2019-10, this endpoint implements pagination by using links that are provided in the response header. Sending the page parameter will return an error. To learn more, see Make paginated requests to the REST Admin API.
paths.summary: Retrieves a list of all script tags

parameters.name: created_at_max
parameters.description: Show script tags created before this date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

parameters.name: created_at_min
parameters.description: Show script tags created after this date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return.

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Restrict results to after the specified ID.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: Show script tags with this URL.

parameters.name: updated_at_max
parameters.description: Show script tags last updated before this date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

parameters.name: updated_at_min
parameters.description: Show script tags last updated after this date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

200.description: Retrieves a list of all script tags

x-examples.name: Retrieve a list of all script tags

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/script_tags.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::ScriptTag.all(
  session: test_session,
)

x-examples.name: Retrieve a list of all script tags with a particular URL

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/script_tags.json?src=https%3A%2F%2Fjs-aplenty.com%2Ffoo.js" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::ScriptTag.all(
  session: test_session,
  src: "https://js-aplenty.com/foo.js",
)

x-examples.name: Retrieve a list of all script tags after the specified ID

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/script_tags.json?since_id=421379493" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::ScriptTag.all(
  session: test_session,
  since_id: "421379493",
)

curl -d '{"script_tag":{"event":"onload","src":"https://djavaskripped.org/fancy.js"}}' \
-X POST "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/script_tags.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

script_tag = ShopifyAPI::ScriptTag.new(session: test_session)
script_tag.event = "onload"
script_tag.src = "https://djavaskripped.org/fancy.js"
script_tag.save()

response.body: {"errors":{"src":["can't be blank","must be secure (HTTPS)"],"event":["can't be blank","is invalid"]}}

x-examples.name: Creating a script tag without a src and event will return an error

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"script_tag":{"body":"foobar"}}' \
-X POST "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/script_tags.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

script_tag = ShopifyAPI::ScriptTag.new(session: test_session)
script_tag.body = "foobar"
script_tag.save()

paths.description: Retrieves a count of all script tags
paths.summary: Retrieves a count of all script tags

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: Count only script tags with a given URL.

200.description: Retrieves a count of all script tags

x-examples.name: Retrieve a count of all script tags for your shop

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/script_tags/count.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::ScriptTag.count(
  session: test_session,
)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

x-examples.name: Retrieve a single script tag by its ID

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/script_tags/596726825.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::ScriptTag.find(
  session: test_session,
  id: 596726825,
)

curl -d '{"script_tag":{"id":596726825,"src":"https://somewhere-else.com/another.js"}}' \
-X PUT "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/script_tags/596726825.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

script_tag = ShopifyAPI::ScriptTag.new(session: test_session)
script_tag.id = 596726825
script_tag.src = "https://somewhere-else.com/another.js"
script_tag.save()

curl -X DELETE "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/script_tags/596726825.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::ScriptTag.delete(
  session: test_session,
  id: 596726825,
)

properties.description: The date and time (ISO 8601) when the script tag was created.
properties.name: created_at

properties.description: The DOM event that triggers the loading of the script. Valid values: onload.
properties.name: event

properties.description: The ID for the script tag.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The URL of the remote script.
properties.name: src

properties.description:
The page or pages on the online store where the script should be included. Valid values:
  • online_store: Include the script only on the web storefront.
  • order_status: Include the script only on the order status page.
  • all: Include the script on both the web storefront and the order status page.
properties.name: display_scope

properties.description:
Whether the Shopify CDN can cache and serve the script tag. Valid values:
  • true: The script will be cached and served by the CDN. The cache expires 15 minutes after the script tag is successfully returned.
  • false: The script will be served as is.
Default value: false.
properties.name: cache

properties.description: The date and time (ISO 8601) when the script tag was last updated.
properties.name: updated_at

x-shopify-meta.meta_description: Load remote JavaScript into the storefront and order status pages of an online store to add functionality without modifying the store's theme files.
